channel.title: Matrix 718 New Shops Error
channel.description:
Hey Guys i followed the tutorials to get Matrix 718 shops working, placed everything in the correct places...
Buttonhandler.java Worldpacketsdecoder.java shop.java
this is the tut. 718+ New shops
When i compile i get a few errors... heres my cmd, please reply asap its 3:20 am ere
Destruction 718 Compiler
C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\ bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Pl ayer.java src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ButtonHandler.jav a:1009: error: method sendInfo in class Shop cannot be applied to given types; shop.sendInfo(player, slotId); ^ required: Player,int,boolean found: Player,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length 1 error Destruction Compiler Parte 1
C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\ bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Eq uipment.java src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ButtonHandler.jav a:1009: error: method sendInfo in class Shop cannot be applied to given types; shop.sendInfo(player, slotId); ^ required: Player,int,boolean found: Player,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length 1 error Destruction Compiler Parte 2
C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\ bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java
src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ButtonHandler.jav a:1009: error: method sendInfo in class Shop cannot be applied to given types; shop.sendInfo(player, slotId); ^ required: Player,int,boolean found: Player,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length 1 error Destruction Compiler Parte 3
C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\ bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/di alogues/*.java src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ButtonHandler.jav a:1009: error: method sendInfo in class Shop cannot be applied to given types; shop.sendInfo(player, slotId); ^ required: Player,int,boolean found: Player,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length 1 error Destruction Compiler Parte 4
C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\ bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ButtonHandler.jav a:1009: error: method sendInfo in class Shop cannot be applied to given types; shop.sendInfo(player, slotId); ^ required: Player,int,boolean found: Player,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length 1 error Destruction Compiler Parte 5
C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\ bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/co ntent/*.java src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ButtonHandler.jav a:1009: error: method sendInfo in class Shop cannot be applied to given types; shop.sendInfo(player, slotId); ^ required: Player,int,boolean found: Player,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length 1 error Destruction Compiler Parte 6
C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\ bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/h andlers/*.java src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ButtonHandler.jav a:1009: error: method sendInfo in class Shop cannot be applied to given types; shop.sendInfo(player, slotId); ^ required: Player,int,boolean found: Player,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length 1 error Destruction Has Compiled 100!
C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>pause Press any key to continue . . .
I can't get it working. I would be glad if you gave buttonhandler.java, shop.java and worldspacketdecoder.java. Pm me if you want to help or reply here.

item.title: Matrix 718 New Shops Error
item.dc:creator: @ComputerLove ComputerLove
item.description:
@ComputerLove wrote:

Hey Guys i followed the tutorials to get Matrix 718 shops working, placed everything in the correct places…

Buttonhandler.java
Worldpacketsdecoder.java
shop.java

this is the tut. 718+ New shops

When i compile i get a few errors… heres my cmd, please reply asap its 3:20 am ere

Destruction 718 Compiler

C:\Users\chris\Desktop\Destruction 718>“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_07
bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Pl
ayer.java
src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\ButtonHandler.jav a:1009: error: method sendInfo
in class Shop cannot be applied to given types;
shop.sendInfo(player, slotId);
^
required: Player,int,boolean
found: Player,int
reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length
1 error
